content: Hi, I'm very interested in the Senior Frontend Developer position. Could you tell me more about the tech stack?
Hello Sarah! Thanks for your interest. We primarily use React, TypeScript, and GraphQL. We're also moving towards a microservices architecture with Node.js backends.
That sounds perfect! I have extensive experience with all those technologies. When would be a good time for a technical interview?
Hi Marcus, I reviewed your application for the Product Manager role. Your background is impressive! Could we schedule a call to discuss your experience with user research?
Absolutely! I'm available this week. I've led several user research initiatives that directly influenced product decisions and improved user satisfaction.
